DOC.brief_summary: Gastric Bypass followed by renal transplantation is superior to medical management followed by renal transplant for patients with severe obesity and renal failure.
DOC.brief_title: Obesity Surgery and Kidney Transplant for Patients With Obesity and Renal Failure
